fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.view

Class StreamView

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.polytech.prd.plateforme.view.StreamView

  • public class StreamView
extends java.lang.Object
    The StreamView class is made to display the stream to the screen.

    StreamView creates a JFrame and add a EmbeddedMediaPlayerComponent to it, so that it can play the stream.

    Author:
    Romain Rousseau

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamView

        public StreamView(java.lang.String channelName)
        Constructor of the StreamView object. This constructor sets the title of the frame with the channel name and his status (loading or running). It contains the windowListener and the mediaListener.
        Parameters:
        channelName: - name of the TV Channel

    • Method Detail

      • closeWindow

        private void closeWindow()
        Method that calls the event windowClosing in the constructor.

      • playMedia

        public void playMedia(java.lang.Integer port)
        This method plays the video with its media player. It creates an object MediaPlayer and plays the stream at the address "127.0.0.1:(port)". The address "127.0.0.1" is the default address used by streamlink.
        Parameters:
        port: - the communication port that has to be listened.
